content.html:
↳ In-reply-to » Trying to wrap my head around webfinger..

@xuu@txt.sour.is I’m not so convinced of this “prefixing” here… We’re sort of euplidating that extra bit of information anyway in the rel(s) – Maybe @abucci@anthony.buc.ci is right and we stick to the spirit of the spec and an alias is just that, another identifier that is the same as this one. For example in yarnd we could add support in Settings for adding other “identities” that are the same as your, so a webfinger for prologic@twtxt.net could also have prologic@shortcircuit.net.au and james@mills.io as aliases?

↳ In-reply-to » @xuu that doesn't seem to fit the spirit of the spec, at least by my read (I could be wrong obv). The example on Wikipedia's webfinger page,

@abucci@anthony.buc.ci I feel the same way 👌

↳ In-reply-to » @xuu meh, I personally don't like following what some corporation is adding to a spec. Microsoft pioneered embrace, extend, extinguish and they have many copycats. I always prefer sticking to the spec or the spirit of the spec.

@abucci@anthony.buc.ci Same 👌

↳ In-reply-to » @bender I see I see 😅 And you? 🤣

@bender LOL 🤣

↳ In-reply-to » Would someone be able to help me sort our issues in the mobile app (Goryon) into the Release milestone. Let's do what @thecanine suggested and just fix the bugs and release it finally 👌

I had a first crack at it, if I’m right, we can knock this over with just 26 issues to solve 🤞

content.html:
↳ In-reply-to » Trying to wrap my head around webfinger..

@xuu@txt.sour.is Yeah I see where you’re coming from, and if your Salty IM address is on another domain entirely, then yeah… But if for example you have a Yarn and Salty account on the same domain, and both are for example xuu@sour.is – I would fully expect to see them both as aliases with respective rel(s) no?

↳ In-reply-to » @prologic you need to write more like this. No errors, no emoji, no stylised words. Ah, yes, so much easier to read. Keep it up!

@bender I often do when I’m rather serious and well when I’m not trying to convey “emotion” 😅

↳ In-reply-to » #randomQuestionOfTheDay

@bender I see I see 😅 And you? 🤣
Would someone be able to help me sort our issues in the mobile app (Goryon) into the Release milestone. Let’s do what @thecanine suggested and just fix the bugs and release it finally 👌

content.html:
↳ In-reply-to » #randomQuestionOfTheDay

@akoizumi@social.kyoko-project.wer.ee Oh come on now 😅 We see you around, you share cool shit™ sometimes, I’d say you enjoy microblogging just as much as the rest of us 🤣

↳ In-reply-to » Trying to wrap my head around webfinger..

@xuu@txt.sour.is So… From a practical perspective, wouldn’t it make sense to have related identifiers that are “related” to the subject? Hence rel? If I were a user, I would expect to lookup only prologic@twtxt.net to find both my Yarn and Salty accounts and ways to follow or message me as such.
Yesterday I did some ridiculous amount of exercise 😱
